title: "Non-invasive peripheral nerve stimulation selectively enhances speech category learning in adults"
excerpt: "Adults struggle to learn non-native speech contrasts even after years of exposure. While laboratory-based training approaches yield learning, the optimal training conditions for maximizing speech learning in adulthood are currently unknown."
